Package org.oxt.toolbox.validation

Interface IValidator

All Known Implementing Classes:
ValidatorImpl
public interface IValidator
Interface defining the methods for XRechnung validation.
Author:
Dr. Jan C. Thiele

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String runValidation​(java.lang.String invoiceFile, java.lang.String invoicePath, java.lang.String scenarioXmlPath)
    Method to run the validation.
    void saveAs​(java.lang.String filePath)
    Method to save the validation report to a file.

  • Method Details

    • runValidation

      java.lang.String runValidation​(java.lang.String invoiceFile, java.lang.String invoicePath, java.lang.String scenarioXmlPath) throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException, java.io.IOException, java.lang.Exception
      Method to run the validation.
      Parameters:
      invoiceFile - name of invoice file
      invoicePath - path of invoice file
      scenarioXmlPath - path to validation scenario file
      Returns:
      string string with validation report
      Throws:
      javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - invalid XML stream
      java.io.IOException - read error
      java.lang.Exception - unspecific error

    • saveAs

      void saveAs​(java.lang.String filePath) throws java.io.IOException
      Method to save the validation report to a file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - file path to save the report into
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - write error
